title: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim - The Skyrim Library, Vol. I: The Histories
description: For the first time, the collected texts from the critically and commercially acclaimed fantasy video game The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim are bound together in three exciting volumes. Lavishly illustrated and produced, these titles are straight out of the world of Skyrim - and a must for any wandering adventurer.
author: Bethesda Softworks
